unitId.description: The ad unit ID can be created in the main traffic module of the Mini Program management background
unitId.description_zh: 广告单元id，可在小程序管理后台的流量主模块新建

adIntervals.description: The interval between ad auto-refreshes, in seconds, and the parameter value must be greater than or equal to 30 (the parameter will not automatically refresh when the Banner ad is not passed)
adIntervals.description_zh: 广告自动刷新的间隔时间，单位为秒，参数值必须大于等于30（该参数不传入时 Banner 广告不会自动刷新）

onLoad.description: A callback that the ad has been successfully loaded

onError.description: When an error occurs in an advertisement, the triggered event can obtain the error code and the reason through the event
onError.description_zh: 当广告发生错误时，触发的事件，可以通过该事件获取错误码及原因
